sql-case.value: ALTER ROLE role1 WITH ENCRYPTED PASSWORD 'password'
ALTER ROLE CURRENT_USER WITH ENCRYPTED PASSWORD 'password'
ALTER ROLE role1 WITH CREATEDB CREATEROLE
ALTER ROLE role1_bak RENAME TO role1
